name: GeoGrep
description: This was a highly involved one-page, mobile optimised, responsive JS web app, built to demonstrate GeoGrep's new SaaS geo-spatial search REST API. The app was built using Backbone+Marionette, LeafletJS for the maps and Grunt/RequireJS for the build process. I additionally built a Node.JS server component to compliment the app which handled geocoding, geocoding autocomplete and Google Recaptcha services. Shout-out to Pete Goodman who worked on this with me.

name: DYOSB
description: Design and build of a full stack web application for customising and ordering a high-spec sleeping bag. Features highly interactive JS on the frontend using Backbone+Marionette, a Node.JS/CouchDB backend running on Heroku, integration with an e-commerce layer and a Grunt based build and deployment process.
